${modID}:HookAndDragPower.NAME: Hook and Drag
DESCRIPTIONS: Hidden power

${modID}:HookedPower.NAME: Hooked
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your next turn, loses #b%1$s HP for each card drawn.

${modID}:HighExplosiveGrenadePower.NAME: High Explosive Grenade
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of #b%1$s turns, deal #b%2$s damage to ALL enemies.
At the end of this turn, deal #b%1$s damage to ALL enemies.

DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of #b%1$s turns, deal #b%2$s damage to EVERYONE.

At the end of this turn, gain #b%1$s block and deal #b%2$s damage to ALL enemies.

DESCRIPTIONS: Draw #b%1$s additional cards at the start of each turn. You cannot draw additional cards after.
